sentence: Home improvement warehouse operator The Home Depot, Inc. ( HD ) on Friday caught some positive commentary from analysts at BMO Capital.
The firm maintained its "Market Perform" rating on HD but raised its price target to $51, suggesting a 9% upside to the stock's Thursday closing price of $46.95.
The firm also raised its earnings estimates for HD through 2013, citing higher comparable sales.
Home Depot shares were mostly flat in premarket trading Friday.
Shares of Home Depot ( HD ) have a 2.47% dividend yield, based on Friday's closing stock price of $46.95.
The stock has technical support in the $42 price area.
If the shares can firm up, we see overhead resistance around the $50-$52 price levels.
The Home Depot, Inc. ( HD ) is not recommended at this time, holding a Dividend.com DARSâ„¢ Rating of 3.4 out of 5 stars.
